Event.EventName: As you enter the pub, you hear the familiar clunking of a game of snooker. As you approach one of the guys playing asks if you're up for a wager. Got some loo roll spare out back if you win, if not you've gotta help my gran

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: You're not much of a snooker player, you've never been able to get it in the net (Or is that basketball). Either way gamblings a suckers game
